amendment.description: To require FinCEN to submit to Congress a report on Geographic Targeting Orders.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3560 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3560 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5500) To require FinCEN to submit to Congress a report on Geographic Targeting Orders.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3560 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3560 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
